newsitem.title: USA: UAL Corp Q4 oper net up.
newsitem.headline: UAL Corp Q4 oper net up.

text.p: Oper shr $1.06 $0.63
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Earnings on a fully distributed basis including all employee stock ownership plan (ESOP) shares.
Q4 1996 results before $1.0 million loss on retirement of debt, but after $3.0 million in preferred dividends.
Q4 1995 results before $29.0 million loss on early retirement of debt but after $8.0 million in preferred stock dividends.
Q4 1996 fully distributed net earnings after items $0.84 a share vs $0.21.
Q4 1996 earnings from operations $250.0 million vs $190.0 million.
On generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP) basis, Q4 1996 profit $0.12 a share before loss on debt and effects of preferred stock transactions vs loss $0.58 a share.
YEAR
Oper shr $7.68 $5.19
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Full-year 1996, 1995 results on fully distributed basis.
Full-year 1996 earnings after $20 million in preferred stock dividends and $3.0 gain on convertible debentures, but before $67.0 million loss on early extinguishment of debt.
Full-year 1995 results after $15.0 million in preferred dividends but before $30 million loss on early extinguishment of debt.
Full-year 1996 fully distributed earnings after items $6.81 a share vs $5.13 a share.
Full-year 1996 earnings from operations $1.81 billion vs $1.33 billion.
On GAAP basis, full-year 1996 earnings before extraordinary loss on early extinguishment of debt and effects of preferred stock transactions $6.39 a share vs $4.90.
((Reuters Chicago Newsdesk (312) 408-8787))
